projects.title: Fergus James Jewelry
projects.description: A luxury jewelry e-commerce platform specializing in custom diamond engagement rings, offering a seamless browsing and buying experience with a focus on personalization and trust.

caseStudy.overview: Fergus James is a luxury jewelry brand focused on custom-made diamond engagement rings, offering customers a high-end online experience that combines craftsmanship, transparency, and convenience.
caseStudy.challenge: The client needed a platform that could showcase premium jewelry collections with high-quality imagery, support a global audience, integrate with secure payment gateways, and provide a smooth custom ring-building experience.
caseStudy.solution: We developed a fully responsive React-based SPA integrated with a headless CMS for dynamic content management. We implemented advanced product filtering, a 3D ring customization feature, and secure payment processing with Stripe. Performance optimization and SEO best practices were applied to maximize organic reach.
results: Increased online sales by 40% in the first quarter
Reduced bounce rate by 35% through improved UX
Achieved top rankings for competitive diamond ring keywords
Enabled customers to customize rings with live previews

projects.title: Tantraa Events
projects.description: Tantraa is a corporate event management company in India that creates elevated and unforgettable brand experiences, delivering creative and strategic execution for events including exhibitions, summits, awards, product launches, and experiential spaces.

caseStudy.overview: Tantraa specializes in corporate and experiential event management, blending creativity, innovation, and meticulous planning to bring brand stories to life across India and beyond.
caseStudy.challenge: To build memorable brand experiences that stand out in a competitive event management industry, requiring high creativity, flawless execution and strong client relationships.
caseStudy.solution: Delivered bespoke event management services including conceptualization, experiential design, execution, logistics and strategic planning for various high-profile events. Integrated sustainability (ESG) approaches in planning where possible.
results: Successfully executed major events like NLC Bharat, Myntra Creators Fest, and Volvo C40 Mega Launch
Delivered immersive brand experiences with high client satisfaction
Developed long-term partnerships with repeat corporate clients
Enhanced visibility and recognition in the Indian event management industry

projects.title: Karunya Ram Official
projects.description: Official portfolio and professional website of Karunya Ram — Indian actress, entrepreneur, creative leader and motivational speaker showcasing her journey, media, services, and social initiatives.

caseStudy.overview: Karunya Ram is a multifaceted Indian actress and entrepreneur who leverages her creative and leadership skills to inspire audiences through cinema, community initiatives, motivational talks, and brand collaborations. Her website highlights her journey, media presence, bookings, blogs, and contact information.
caseStudy.challenge: To present a strong personal brand image online that communicates Karunya’s diverse talents — from acting to social impact work — while enabling fans and collaborators to connect and book her services seamlessly.
caseStudy.solution: Developed a professional portfolio website featuring sections like Journey, Media, Manifest, Blogs, Booking, and Contact to build credibility, support brand partnerships, and engage audiences with a compelling narrative of influence and empowerment.
results: Built an authoritative online presence for Karunya Ram
Enabled brand endorsements and event bookings
Showcased multimedia content and motivational resources
Facilitated community outreach and audience engagement
